01.title: Clothed with Strength
01.scripture: Proverbs 31:25 – 'She is clothed with strength and dignity; she can laugh at the days to come.'
01.devotion: God didn’t dress you in fear. He clothed you with strength. In a world that tries to strip you of worth, God wraps you in dignity. You can face what’s coming, not because you’re fearless, but because you’re clothed in His character.
01.prayer: Lord, remind me that I don’t wear worry—I wear Your strength.

02.title: Daughter of the King
02.scripture: Psalm 45:13 – 'All glorious is the princess in her chamber, with robes interwoven with gold.'
02.devotion: You are not average. You’re royalty. You were made for more than surviving—you were made to reign with Christ. Don’t let the world define you. Let your crown remind you.
02.prayer: Jesus, help me walk like the royalty You say I am, not how the world tries to label me.

03.title: Beauty in the Broken
03.scripture: Isaiah 61:3 – '...to bestow on them a crown of beauty instead of ashes...'
03.devotion: God doesn’t discard broken things—He rebuilds them into something better. Even your pain isn’t wasted. The pieces you thought disqualified you? God turns them into beauty marks of grace.
03.prayer: God, show me the beauty You’re forming from my brokenness.

04.title: More Than Enough
04.scripture: 2 Corinthians 12:9 – 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.'
04.devotion: You don’t have to be everything for everyone. His grace fills the gaps. Where you feel not enough—too tired, too flawed, too broken—He says, “My grace is enough for you.”
04.prayer: Jesus, I receive Your grace as enough today. I release the pressure to perform.

05.title: Carried Through
05.scripture: Isaiah 46:4 – 'I have made you and I will carry you; I will sustain you and I will rescue you.'
05.devotion: You don’t walk alone. God carries you—not just in your best moments, but especially in the worst. When your strength gives out, His doesn’t. He sustains, supports, and saves.
05.prayer: Lord, thank You for carrying me when I couldn’t carry myself.

06.title: Rooted in Truth
06.scripture: Colossians 2:7 – 'Rooted and built up in him, strengthened in the faith...'
06.devotion: The world shifts, opinions change, but God's truth remains. When you're rooted in Him, you won’t be shaken by what sways culture. Stay grounded. His truth is your anchor.
06.prayer: Lord, plant me deep in Your truth so I won’t be swayed by the storm.

07.title: Brave Even When Shaking
07.scripture: Joshua 1:9 – 'Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid...'
07.devotion: Courage isn’t the absence of fear—it’s moving forward anyway. Brave women aren’t fearless, they just trust the One who goes with them. Shake if you must, but walk anyway.
07.prayer: Father, give me the courage to step forward even when I’m unsure.

08.title: Seen and Known
08.scripture: Genesis 16:13 – 'She gave this name to the Lord who spoke to her: “You are the God who sees me.”'
08.devotion: You’re not invisible to God. In the wilderness, in heartbreak, in confusion—He sees you. He knows your name, your need, and your worth. Just like Hagar, you are not alone.
08.prayer: God who sees me, thank You for noticing the details no one else does.

09.title: Peace Over Pressure
09.scripture: Philippians 4:6-7 – 'Do not be anxious about anything...'
09.devotion: God’s peace is not based on conditions—it surpasses understanding. You don’t have to earn it. Breathe deep. Release control. Let His peace stand guard over your heart today.
09.prayer: Prince of Peace, I surrender my anxiety. Guard my mind with Your calm.

10.title: Unshakable
10.scripture: Psalm 62:6 – 'Truly he is my rock and my salvation; he is my fortress, I will not be shaken.'
10.devotion: When everything else feels unstable—emotions, finances, people—God remains your firm foundation. Stand on Him. He’s never moved by what moves you.
10.prayer: You are my fortress, God. I rest in Your strength, not my own.
